about.mission: At Betfundr, we are committed to simplifying the management of your 1XBET funds. Our mission is to provide a transparent and secure platform that allows users to manage their finances effortlessly. With a commitment to user satisfaction and security, we strive to make the process of funding and withdrawing from your 1XBET account as smooth as possible. Our team is driven by the vision of redefining how users interact with their gaming finances, ensuring peace of mind and convenience at every step of the process.

financing.title: Financing
financing.description: With Betfundr, you can easily fund your 1XBET account without any hassle. Our streamlined process ensures fast and secure transactions, allowing you to focus on what truly matters: the thrill of gaming.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal
withdrawal.description: Say goodbye to complex withdrawal processes. Betfundr offers a simple and efficient withdrawal system, ensuring that your funds are seamlessly transferred to your personal or designated account, giving you full control over your winnings.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: We understand that questions and concerns can arise at any time. That's why our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist you. Whether it's a question about a transaction or a general inquiry, our support team is here to provide you with quick and reliable assistance, ensuring a smooth and stress-free experience.

referral_page.title: Referrals
referral_page.copyReferralLink: Refer Friends to BetFundr and Earn Rewards! Share Your Code And Get Bonuses When They Sign Up And Make Transactions. You Will Also Receive 25% Bonus On Your Referral Deposits. Start Sharing Your Unique Code Now!
referral_page.earningsNote: Note: You can only earn GRAW from 20,000 XOF and above.

home.hero description: Easily make deposits and withdrawals to and from your 1XBET account.
home.quick description: Say goodbye to complicated management of your 1XBET funds. With Betfundr, funding and withdrawals are just a few clicks away.
home.secure description: Your funds, your way. We prioritize security and convenience, ensuring your peace of mind with every transaction.
home.support description: We're here for you around the clock. Our dedicated support team is ready to assist you anytime, anywhere.
home.download description: Download now to startbyour journey with Betfundr
home.enter amount: Enter an amount of at least 500
home.change or leave: Change or leave the original number
home.how does withdrawal work: How does the withdrawal process work with Espece?
home.1xbet withdrawal code: 1Xbet withdrawal code obtained from the 1xbet platform
home.first question description: After providing this information, your withdrawal request will be processed.
home.designate specific account question: Can I designate a specific account for my fund withdrawals?
home.designate specific account answer: Yes, you can designate a specific amount for your fund withdrawal, but it should be the same as your withdrawal request made on the 1xbet platform.
